# Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)

This section explores trends and distributions in historical pipe break data.

## ðŸ“… Temporal Trends

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("../data/combined_breaks.csv")

df['date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['date'], errors='coerce')
df['year'] = df['date'].dt.year
df['month'] = df['date'].dt.month

monthly = df.groupby(['year', 'month']).size().reset_index(name='breaks')
monthly['year_month'] = pd.to_datetime(dict(year=monthly.year, month=monthly.month, day=1))

plt.figure(figsize=(10,4))
plt.plot(monthly['year_month'], monthly['breaks'])
plt.title("Monthly Pipe Breaks Over Time")
plt.xlabel("Date")
plt.ylabel("Breaks")
plt.grid(True)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
